entry.title: At Dynamicland, The Building Is The Computer
entry.quote: This computational research lab is reinventing computer programming

entry.title: A doc as powerful as an app.
entry.quote: Coda is a new doc that grows with your ideas. People have made Coda docs that do everything from launch products, to scale small businesses, to help them study for tests. What will you Coda?

entry.title: The Five Types of People Who Use Visualization
entry.quote: The Doer, the Analyzer, the Decider, the Casual Learner, the Museum Goer

entry.title: My takeaway from working with SwiftUI
entry.quote: Overall the experience with SwiftUI was great. However, you have to try it yourself to know what it has to offer. For me I found it almost too fast to work with, easy to iterate and very approachable. The animations are a breeze to add. More importantly, I can dropdown to UIKit whenever you feel like it.

entry.title: iphone 11 pro camera review: china
entry.quote: While many camera/smartphone manufactures continue to approach digital photography as a technical problem to solve, I see the team at Apple has graduated beyond technical problems and is asking deeper questions like “How can we give artists (everyone) the creative tools to express their vision?”
